title: Spacious 1.5 Bed with Lots of Light
posting_body: ['On the border of Clinton Hill and Bedford Stuyvesant is a spacious 1.5Bed, 1Bath apartment on the second floor of a townhouse.', 'A, C, G trains.', 'Features hardwood floors, closets in the bedrooms and living room, tall ceilings, windowed galley kitchen and southern light.', 'The half bedroom has been used in the past as an office, space for guests, yoga space and more.', 'Currently being repainted but will be ready by August 7th for move-in by August 15th.', 'Neighborhood features within 7-block radius: gym, bars, restaurants, laundromat, and grocers.', 'Tenant pays', '*$41.99 application fee through SmartMove [which includes credit and background check that tenant owns]', '1-month security Deposit', '1-month rent', "1-month broker's fee", 'TOTAL: $7,691.99', 'Open to showing it prior to Open House while it is being renovated.']
